SEARCH
Package simu.model

Class ServicePointController

java.lang.Object
simu.model.ServicePointController
public class ServicePointController extends Object
Controls a group of ServicePoint instances, managing their queues and service processes. Provides methods to interact with and retrieve statistics from the managed service points.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a ServicePointController with a specified number of ServicePoints.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServicePointController

      public ServicePointController(int amount, ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type)
      Constructs a ServicePointController with a specified number of ServicePoints.
      Parameters:
      amount - the number of ServicePoints to create
      generator - the generator used for service times
      eventList - the event list for scheduling events
      type - the type of event handled by the service points

  • Method Details

    • addQueue

      public void addQueue(Customer customer)
      Adds a customer to the queue of the first available (non-reserved) ServicePoint. If all are reserved, adds to the first ServicePoint's queue.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add to a queue

    • removeQueue

      public Customer removeQueue()
      Removes and returns the next customer from the queue of the first ServicePoint that has a queue.
      Returns:
      the removed Customer, or null if no ServicePoint has a queued customer

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved()
      Checks if all ServicePoints are reserved.
      Returns:
      true if all ServicePoints are reserved, false otherwise

    • isOnQueue

      public boolean isOnQueue()
      Checks if any ServicePoint has customers in its queue.
      Returns:
      true if any ServicePoint has customers in queue, false otherwise

    • beginService

      public void beginService()
      Begins service at the first ServicePoint that is not reserved and has customers in its queue.

    • printQueues

      public void printQueues()
      Prints information about the queues in the controller and logs it.

    • getQuelength

      public int getQuelength()
      Gets the total number of customers in all queues managed by this controller.
      Returns:
      the total number of queued customers

    • reservedAmount

      public int reservedAmount()
      Gets the number of ServicePoints that are currently reserved (busy).
      Returns:
      the number of reserved ServicePoints

    • getType

      public EventType getType()
      Gets the EventType of the ServicePoints managed by this controller.
      Returns:
      the EventType scheduled for these ServicePoints

    • getTotalQueue

      public ArrayList<String> getTotalQueue()
      Gets the list of all customer IDs currently queued in all ServicePoints.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of customer IDs in all queues

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this ServicePointController.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string describing the controller, its type, and statistics

    • getResponseTimeInSp

      public double getResponseTimeInSp()
      Calculates the average response time (queue + service) for all ServicePoints.
      Returns:
      the average response time for all serviced tasks

    • getAverageQueLenghtAtSp

      public double getAverageQueLenghtAtSp()
      Calculates the average queue length at the ServicePoints over the simulation time.
      Returns:
      the average queue length

    • getServicePoints

      Gets the array of ServicePoints managed by this controller.
      Returns:
      the array of ServicePoints

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all ServicePoints managed by this controller.
